text: Love Gun is the sixth studio album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on June 30, 1977. == Track listing == *"I Stole Your Love" *"Christine Sixteen" *"Got Love For Sale" *"Shock Me" *"Tomorrow And Tonight" *"Love Gun" *"Hooligan" *"Almost Human" *"Plaster Caster" *"Then She Kissed Me" ==References== Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1977 albums Category:Hard rock albums
title: Love Gun
